name: Ben Halpern

text: Ben received his Ph.D in 2003 from UC Santa Barbara and held a joint post-doctoral fellowship at the National Center for Ecological Analysis and Synthesis (NCEAS) and the Smith Fellowship Program sponsored by The Nature Conservancy.
